Rhinox/Sniper


Rhinox runs at the base. "Auto guns come up and fire on everything 
that fires on me." Rhinox runs into the base. He looks behind. "door, 
close." the door close behind him. he grabs key and walks off towards 
the cr chambers.

Sniper fired 3 rockets and 25 rapid laser, from his rocket launcher 
and rifle, at Anubis. He then looked at sixshot and fired 3 optic 
blast.
